amphibians.description: For those whose sonas are Amphibians.

canines.description: For those whose sonas are Canines.

cervines.description: For those whose sonas are Cervines (deers and creatures with antlers).

equines.description: For those whose sonas are Equines (horses and hooved creatures).

felines.description: For those whose sonas are Felines.

females.description: For those who identify as Female.

gay.description: For those who identify as Gay.

hybrids.description: For those whose sonas are a Hybrid of two species.

lagomorphs.description: For those whose sonas are Lagomorphs (rabbit likes creatures).

lesbian.description: For those who identify as Lesbian.

male.description: For those who identify as Male.

marsupials.description: For those whose sonas are Marsupials (kangaroo like creatures).

multiple Sonas.description: For those who have multiple sonas (fursonas).

mustelids.description: For those whose sonas are Mustelids (weasels, badgers, otters and other creatures alike).

mythical.description: For those whose sona species are mythical (not real).

pokefurs.description: For those whose sonas are based off of characters from the Pok√©mon franchise.

reptiles.description: For those whose sonas are Reptiles.

rodents.description: For those whose sonas are Rodents.

straight.description: For those who identify as Straight.

transgender.description: For those who identify as Transgender.

vulpines.description: For those whose sonas are Vulpines (fox like creatures).
